Summit on Responsible Computing, AI, and Society October 28-30, 2024, Atlanta, Georgia, USA
  • Agenda
  • Speakers
  • Venue
  • Doctoral Consortium
  • Organization
  • Registration

    Venue

    The Summit will take place at the Georgia Tech Global Learning Center in Midtown Atlanta, Georgia. It is connected to the Georgia Tech Hotel and minutes from the School of Interactive Computing and the GT Machine Learning Center.

    Driving directions and parking

    From Fifth Street, enter between the Amazon Storefront and Great Clips.

    You can also enter through the Georgia Tech hotel, 2nd floor.

    From the Georgia Tech parking garage, there is an entrance to the Global Learning Center from the 2nd floor.

    The Summit will be held in Rooms 222, 330 and 334. Proceed to Room 222 to check in.

    Lunch Recommendations

    • Aviva by Kameel Midtown -- Mediterranean
    • Humble Mumble -- Gourmet sandwiches
    • Poke Burri -- poke
    • Atwoods -- Individual sized pizza
    • Tindrum Asian Kitchen and Boba -- pan-asian
    • Boho Taco -- tacos
    • Momonoki -- Japanese comfort fare
    • PONKO Chicken -- Japanese-American fried chicken
    • Cypress Street Pint and Plate -- Gastropub
    • El Valle -- upscale Mexican
    • 26 Thai Kitchen -- upscale Thai
    • Rreal Tacos -- tacos
    • Ahn's Kitchen -- Vietnamese
    • Masti -- Indian street food
    • Nagomiya -- sushi
    • Xi'an Gourmet House -- traditional Xi'an style Chinese
    • Marlow's Tavern -- pub food
